channel.title: Getting the server name, player amount, and owner name at top of screen?

item.title: Getting the server name, player amount, and owner name at top of screen?
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

The very 1st public void I get is this and I don’t know if I can do it here…

public void actionReset() {

EDIT: OK, I added it above that public void… But there’s still nothing at the top of my screen…

EDIT: Anyone…? I see Eh Pretty Easy has left…

item.title: Getting the server name, player amount, and owner name at top of screen?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Search for public void and add public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @dre@~BarteloScape~", 6570); sendFrame126("@bla@Owner: Quicksilver", 6572); sendFrame126(" @dre@Players: " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 } above it

item.title: Getting the server name, player amount, and owner name at top of screen?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

If you don’t have writePlayers void, then add that with your other voids, just leave out the //Playercount and server name at top of screen. Then search for public boolean process and under it add writePlayers();

item.title: Getting the server name, player amount, and owner name at top of screen?
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

I just need a link or something.

I have a PimpScape server source. Thanks.

EDIT:I found out what I have to do, but where do you add it? This is what I found…

//Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @dre@~BarteloScape~", 6570); sendFrame126("@bla@Owner: Quicksilver", 6572); sendFrame126(" @dre@Players: " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

Read full topic
